name: Yvette Terry
title: HUSBAND LOVES IT
review: Got this as a gift for my husband and he couldnâ€™t be happier. Looks great, super functional, feels durable. 10/10

name: Jones Ochoa
title: FATHER LOVES IT
review: I'm actually really enjoying the RuckSac. I'm actually using it as my pilots bag. He does a great job of holding all the different items I need Including an iPad and avionics headphones. If I could change anything about it it would be to add magnets to the top flap like I have on my TacSac. Other than that, this is a great sac!

name: Amelia Richards
title: AMAIZING EXPERIENCE WITH IT
review: This is a fabulous rucksac for everyday use. More than enough room for your laptop, cables, chargers and just the stuff you need to get through your day. The internal pouch for your laptop does not extend all the way to the bottom of the bag, so you basically get additional storage area at the bottom of the bag while still being able to retrieve your electronics. I use my Man-Bag Damnit inside of the rucksac as a case for miscellaneous things. Great combination.

name: Hilary Burt
title: AMAZING QUALITY AND FEATURES
review: Got this bag last year as a gift and, I am in love!! The quality of the bag is amazing, it looks even better, holds everything I need including a 26 oz YETI, admin pouch is a must to fully utilize this bag, but other than that outstanding product and led me to fall in love with many other nutsacs- admin pouch, MBD, wallet, Dopp kit, and the duffle.

name: Lauri Terrell
title: VERY EFFICIENT
review: I was skeptical at first due to failed work bags unable to hold up. Luckily, nutsac provided what I needed for a reasonable price. I'm very happy with my purchase and I appreciate the quality and effort.r
